article_title: Krispy Kreme to Open First South American Stores
article_text:
Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Inc. signed its first development agreement in South America, under which its new franchise partner, Bogota-based IRCC Ltda., expects to develop 25 stores in Colombia over the next five years.

IRCC, a subsidiary of VA Group, plans to develop the stores in Colombian cities including Bogotá, Medellín and Barranquilla.

...

article_summary:
IRCC, a subsidiary of VA Group, plans to develop the stores in Colombian cities including Bogotá, Medellín and Barranquilla.
Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Inc. signed its first development agreement in South America, under which its new franchise partner, Bogota-based IRCC Ltda., expects to develop 25 stores in Colombia over the next five years.
